ambiguity.explanation: Three components: Chain A (Danger Zone>Fred>Ambush>Scalded Dawg) from two clustered messages; Chain B (Scooter>Dandelion>Wizard>Caper); and Go Hogs Go unlinked except an explicitly uncertain relation with Scooter. No bridging evidence connects the chains or locates Go Hogs Go, and one early message (Sam) conflicts with later omission of Danger Zone when declaring 'Fred in front'.

evidence.text: No one in front. Fred behind.
evidence.author: Sam Beckman
